main_definition: in the same way or degree; with fairness or impartiality.

meanings_and_examples.definition: With equal measure, intensity, or importance.
meanings_and_examples.example: She gave her time and effort equally to both of her children.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In a way that treats everyone fairly or impartially.
meanings_and_examples.example: The committee made decisions equally, considering the opinions of all members.

meanings_and_examples.definition: With exactly the same degree of comparison; on an equal basis.
meanings_and_examples.example: They were evaluated based on their performance equally, without bias towards gender or age.
